column4: I'm struggling to make my fglrx driver 8.22.5 to work on dapper. I get stuck because of a weird message "did you mean tab instead of 8 spaces" when doing module-assistant. Has anyone expercienced this?
actually I want expecting my driver to get compiled, no see such a funny message....
did you have to modify any config files? you probably have 8 spaces some where a tab should be
